AT.name: Star Soldier
AT.description: Steuere das Kampfraumschiff Caesar und besiege das böse Star Brain und seine Armeen in diesem klassischen NES™-Shoot'em Up. Star Soldier war der Ursprung einer lang anhaltenden Serie von Soldier-Titeln aus dem Hause Hudson Soft. Fliege dein Schiff durch 16 gefährliche Level auf einer gewaltigen Raumstation und sammele Power-Kapseln ein, um die Feuerkraft, die Geschwindigkeit und den Schild deines Schiffs zu verbessern. Pulverisiere gegnerische Angriffswellen oder fliege unter der Raumstation entlang, um feindliches Feuer zu vermeiden. Erobere jeden einzelnen Level, um es dann im finalen Kampf mit Star Brain aufzunehmen.

CY.name: Star Soldier
CY.description: Take control of the starship Caesar and defeat the evil Star Brain and its armies in this classic NES™ shoot ‘em up. Star Soldier spawned Hudson Soft’s long-running series of Soldier titles. Pilot your ship through 16 deadly stages across an enormous space station, collecting power capsules to increase your ship’s firepower, speed and shields. Blast waves of enemies or fly under the space station to avoid incoming fire. Conquer each stage to make your way to the final confrontation with Star Brain.

BE.name: Star Soldier
BE.description: Prenez les commandes du vaisseau Caesar et triomphez du maléfique Star Brain et de son armée dans ce grand classique du shoot 'em up sur la NES™. Star Soldier est le premier volet d'une longue série développée par Hudson Soft. Pilotez votre vaisseaux à travers 16 stages mortels dans une immense station spatiale et ramassez des capsules de pouvoir pour améliorer votre puissance de feu, votre vitesse et vos boucliers. Terrassez de nombreuses vagues d'ennemis et filez sous la station spatiale pour éviter leurs tirs. Traversez tous les stages pour atteindre Star Brain et le vaincre !

ES.name: Star Soldier
ES.description: Ponte a los mandos de la nave estelar Caesar y acaba con el malvado Star Brain y su ejército en este clásico juego de disparos para NES™. Star Soldier dio origen a la extensa serie de títulos Soldier de Hudson Soft. Toma el control de tu nave y recorre 16 niveles llenos de peligros a través de una enorme estación espacial. Por el camino encontrarás cápsulas de poder que te permitirán aumentar la potencia de ataque y velocidad de tu nave, además de activar el escudo. Pulveriza oleadas de atacantes o evita el fuego enemigo volando por debajo de la estación espacial. Supera cada nivel para avanzar hasta el enfrentamiento final con Star Brain.

IT.name: Star Soldier
IT.description: Prendi il controllo della navicella spaziale Caesar e preparati ad affrontare il terribile Star Brain e il suo esercito in questo classico sparatutto per NES™. Star Soldier è il primo titolo della fortunata serie Soldier di Hudson Soft. Attraversa i 16 livelli mortali di un'enorme stazione spaziale, e raccogli i potenziamenti per migliorare il tuo arsenale, perfezionare le difese e aumentare la velocità della tua navicella. Sconfiggi orde di nemici o evita il loro fuoco volando sotto la stazione spaziale. Supera ciascun livello e preparati allo scontro finale con Star Brain!

NZ.name: Star Soldier
NZ.description: Take control of the starship Caesar and defeat the evil Star Brain and its armies in this classic NES™ shoot ‘em up. Star Soldier spawned Hudson Soft’s long-running series of Soldier titles. NL.name: Star Soldier
NL.description: Stap in het ruimteschip Caesar en versla de kwaadaardige Star Brain en zijn leger in dit klassieke schietspel uit het NES™-tijdperk. Star Soldier was het begin van de langlopende reeks van Soldier-games van Hudson Soft. Bestuur je ruimteschip door 16 levensgevaarlijke levels verdeeld over een gigantisch ruimtestation terwijl je krachtcapsules verzamelt om je vuurkracht, snelheid en schilden te verbeteren. Vernietig vijandelijke aanvalsgolven of vlieg onder het ruimtestation om inkomende projectielen te ontwijken. Voltooi elk level om uiteindelijk de confrontatie aan te gaan met Star Brain.

LV.name: Star Soldier
LV.description: Take control of the starship Caesar and defeat the evil Star Brain and its armies in this classic NES™ shoot ‘em up. Star Soldier spawned Hudson Soft’s long-running series of Soldier titles. Blast waves of enemies or fly under the space station to avoid incoming fire. Conquer each stage to make your way to the final confrontation with Star Brain.

PT.name: Star Soldier
PT.description: Toma o controlo da nave Caesar e derrota o maléfico Star Brain e os seus exércitos neste shoot 'em up clássico da NES™. Star Soldier deu início à extensa série Soldier da Hudson Soft. Pilota a tua nave por entre 16 níveis mortíferos ao longo de uma enorme estação espacial, enquanto recolhes cápsulas de energia que aumentam o poder de fogo, a velocidade e a proteção dos escudos da tua nave. Dispara sobre vagas de inimigos ou voa por baixo da estação espacial para evitares fogo inimigo. Conquista cada um dos níveis enquanto abres caminho até ao confronto final com Star Brain.

ZA.name: Star Soldier
ZA.description: Take control of the starship Caesar and defeat the evil Star Brain and its armies in this classic NES™ shoot ‘em up. Star Soldier spawned Hudson Soft’s long-running series of Soldier titles. Pilot your ship through 16 deadly stages across an enormous space station, collecting power capsules to increase your ship’s firepower, speed and shields. RU.name: Star Soldier
RU.description: Садитесь за штурвал звездолета Caesar и разгромите злобный Star Brain (Звездный Мозг) и его приспешников в пух и прах! Игра Star Soldier для NES™ стала первой среди многочисленных игр серии Soldier компании Hudson Soft. Вам предстоит провести звездолет через 16 сложных уровней гигантской космической станции. Собирайте капсулы силы, чтобы улучшить защиту звездолета, а также увеличить его скорость и огневую мощь. Вы можете прокладывать себе путь сквозь полчища врагов или скрываться от обстрела под палубами космической станции. Пройдя все уровни, вы сразитесь с главным боссом игры — Star Brain.

RO.name: Star Soldier
RO.description: Take control of the starship Caesar and defeat the evil Star Brain and its armies in this classic NES™ shoot ‘em up. Star Soldier spawned Hudson Soft’s long-running series of Soldier titles. Pilot your ship through 16 deadly stages across an enormous space station, collecting power capsules to increase your ship’s firepower, speed and shields. Blast waves of enemies or fly under the space station to avoid incoming fire. Conquer each stage to make your way to the final confrontation with Star Brain.
